com.cs421.rccar.Slave
Class Slave

java.lang.Object
  com.cs421.rccar.Slave.Slave

public class Slave
extends java.lang.Object

This class acts as a container for the UsbCar.java class and passes information received via Bluetooth connection to a Driveable object

Author:
David Widen, Jessie Young, Thomas Cheng
